data.title: Derby Supply Chain Solutions
data.meta_description: Our Cleveland facility in southeastern Tennessee has several hundred thousand square feet of operating space in a rapidly growing region.
data.text:
Chattanooga 3PL services from a world-class company

Located in the southeast region of the Tennessee River Valley Basin, Derby’s Cleveland, Tennessee warehouse is located just 30 minutes north of downtown Chattanooga. With convenient access to several major interstate highways (I-75, I-59, and I-24) , our Tennessee warehouse is within a 120-mile radius of Atlanta, Georgia and Knoxville, Tennessee.

Supply chain solutions for every industry

With 230,000 square feet of space, the Cleveland facility handles logistics services for a variety of clients. At this location, we provide warehousing, distribution, packaging, rework, and food grade services scaled to meet our customer’s needs. This facility serves as a major Supplier Distribution Center for a major appliance manufacturer supporting over 100 vendors with just-in-time delivery of original equipment manufacturer (OEM) parts.

AIB certified for food industry logistics

Our eastern Tennessee facility can handle the challenges that come from handling food and confectionery products. The site has 25,000 square feet of climate controlled space, AIB-certified “Superior.”

Cleveland, Tennessee Facility

3285 Davy Crockett Drive

Cleveland, Tennessee, 37323

(423) 614-6766

ISO 9001: 2015 Certified

A Tennessee supply chain provider with expertise you can depend on

For 40 years, we’ve been working with customers to find 3PL solutions that work best for their needs. Our Cleveland facility lets us serve clients of all industries and sizes, from outdoor product manufacturers to health & beauty companies. No matter what 3PL service you are looking for, we have the experience and expertise you need to solve your logistics dilemma.
